name: The Juiciest Game
description:
Randomly generated, rouge-like, dungeon crawler specifically designed to be as juicy as possible.

Controls:
> move - wasd
> fire - holt left mouse
> aim - cursor

Hot Keys:
> F4 - toggle full screen
> F6 - master volume down
> F7 - master volume up
> Delete - toggle FPS

This game uses assets from these amazing artists:
https://o-lobster.itch.io/
https://darkpixel-kronovi.itch.io/

SFX and BGM files are completely free to use for any purpose other than reselling or claiming as your own as long as you give me credit.
